snippet: Former President Bill Clinton and Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. were among those honoring Medgar Evers at a service at Arlington National Cemetery.
abstract: Myrlie Evers-Williams, widow of slain civil rights leader Medgar Evers, and group of about 300 visitors, including Atty Gen Eric H Holder Jr and former Pres Bill Clinton, observe 50th anniversary of Evers's assassination at Arlington National Cemetery, where Evers is buried.
lead_paragraph: Former President Bill Clinton and Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. were among those honoring Medgar Evers at a service at Arlington National Cemetery.

headline.seo: Paying Tribute to Medgar Evers, 50 Years Later
headline.main: Paying Tribute to a Seeker of Justice, 50 Years After His Assassination
headline.print_headline: Paying Tribute to a Seeker of Justice, 50 Years After His Assassination

keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
